creator: Carely Inc.
descriptionHtml:
The newest family relationship management toolkit for long-term and post-acute care settings. Use Carely Community to support families when they need it most.

Carely Community is an easy-to-use, centralized location for caregiving communication and family-engagement tracking. Also available for desktop, our mobile app lets you share updates and coordinate care on-the-go.

Once you’ve joined our Community, families will be able to connect directly with your organization using the Carely Family app.


KEEP YOUR FAMILIES HAPPY
Improve relationships with the care circle around a loved one.

- Send messages
- Share pictures
- React and respond to posts families share with you
- Update the entire family list with community-wide posts

CONNECT WITH FAMILIES IN REAL-TIME
Track family engagement and keep families up-to-date. Also, identify and monitor resident care challenges to improve care outcomes.

- Share time-sensitive care information
- Provide community updates
- Nudge less-engaged families
- Identify and reach out to families who need a little extra support


IMPROVE THE CARE EXPERIENCE.
Support the caregiving experience by pointing your families to the right information at the right time.

SAFE & SECURE COMMUNICATION
Compliant with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), so any content you share within the app is secure. You can assign family roles, such as healthcare power of attorney and financial representative, so you know who the appropriate points of contact are.
descriptionShort: Carely Community is for caregiving communication & family-engagement tracking.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Bug fixes
- Support for flexible premium features

title: Carely Community | Relationship Management Tool

creator: Carely Inc.
descriptionHtml:
A simple and secure caregiving app that keeps care teams connected with resident families who have loved ones in long-term and post-acute care settings. Use Carely Pro to support families when they need it most.
Carely Pro is an easy-to-use, centralized location for caregiving communication and family-engagement tracking. Also available for desktop, our mobile app lets you share updates and coordinate care on-the-go.
Once you’ve joined our community, families will be able to connect directly with your organization using the accompanying Carely Family app.
KEEP YOUR FAMILIES HAPPY
Improve relationships with the care circle around a loved one.
- Send messages
- Track and share resident / patient observations.
- Share pictures
- React and respond to posts families share with you
- Update the entire family list with community-wide posts
CONNECT WITH FAMILIES IN REAL-TIME
Track family engagement and keep families up-to-date. Also, identify and monitor resident care challenges to improve care outcomes.
- Share time-sensitive care information
- Provide community updates
- Nudge less-engaged families
- Identify and reach out to families who need a little extra support
IMPROVE THE FAMILY CARE EXPERIENCE
Support the caregiving experience by pointing your families to the right information at the right time.
SAFE & SECURE COMMUNICATION
Any content you share with the app is secure and compliant with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA). Assign the appropriate points of contact to family members, such as healthcare power of attorney or financial representative, to keep everyone informed.
descriptionShort: Carely Pro is for caregiving communication & family-engagement tracking.
title: Carely Pro for Business
